## WarehouseAPI.setSmartSupply() method

Set smart supply

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |

|  city | [CityName](./bitburner.cityname.md) \| \`${[CityName](./bitburner.cityname.md)<!-- -->}\` | Name of the city |
